about_the_game:
"Rainbow Cloud: A GAY RPG" is a visually stunning side-scrolling action RPG where fantastic combat meets deep character progression. Journey through beautifully designed landscapes, battle powerful foes, solve puzzles, and uncover ancient secrets hidden throughout the world. The story is set in a medieval backdrop and revolves around the male protagonist, Eric, in the fantastical land of Berutta. In this world, you can interact with a variety of characters, including humans, demons, angels, giants, orcs, bearfolk, tigerfolk, werewolves, elves, and more. The game features open-world elements, allowing you to defeat monsters, level up, complete quests, and pursue characters. Additionally, you can romance many NPCs and develop extraordinary relationships with them.
Legend has it that 1,000 years ago, in the distant land of Berutta, the human king Azrael signed a pact with demons, at the cost of his soul, to gain immense power to protect humanity from the enslavement and invasion of giants. A thousand years later, Azrael's reincarnation, Eric, still cannot escape the control of demons, and as his reincarnation progresses, the giants gradually awaken. Under the manipulation of demons and the interference of angels, will he become the destroyer of this world or its savior? The ending of the story depends on your choices.
Key Features:
Dynamic Combat System: Master a variety of magic and skills to defeat enemies in real-time combat. Perform intricate combos, dodge, parry, and unleash devastating special attacks to turn the tide of battle.
Epic Boss Battles: Challenge gigantic, fearsome bosses that require strategy and skill to overcome. Each boss encounter will test your timing, reflexes, and ability to exploit weaknesses.
Rich Storyline: Discover a gripping narrative that takes you through a world filled with ancient lore, warring factions, and mysterious beings. Engage with memorable characters and make choices that influence the story’s outcome, or even develop a romance relationship with them.
Exploration and Puzzle Solving: This is also an open-world game. you can traverse diverse environments from enchanted forests to dark dungeons, solve environmental puzzles, discover hidden treasures, and unlock secret areas as you explore the vast world.
Stunning Comic-Style CG Images: Enjoy beautifully crafted comic-style CG images that enhance the storytelling experience and immerse you in the vibrant world of Rainbow Cloud.
